title: Forever101
author: Forever101
content: As the topic suggest, it is very important to balance our lifestyle as we pursue the dream in cryptocurrency. What are reasons for this discussion, many persons who are new to Cryptocurrency have the habit of constantly checking their phone or laptop from seconds to seconds to see their money jump high to profit. With that kind of mindset, they hardly have time for other things as their mind is just fixed on that money. And in most cases, it leads to breakdown in health as first time or new investors centres their mind on profit especially in our country where things are hard, many young person think, crypto is the saver . As you engage in cryptocurrency, manage everyother part of your life, take care of your family, spend time with them, relate with others, have fun, do other business and have impact on other people's life in a positive way. Staying indoor half of the day or throughout the day is not too helpful, checking your phone on the High way is dangerous. Wisdom demands that every area of your life is balanced as you pursue your investment goal in cryptocurrency.It is also wise to have time allocation for crypto so that it won't consume most of your time, understand the basic and know when to expect profit instead of perpetual checking of your wallet.Cheers

And in most cases, it leads to breakdown in health as first time or new investors centres their mind on profit especially in our country where things are hard, many young person think, crypto is the saver .Nothing wrong with constantly checking on the market to see how your investment is doing, on a larger part it helps you get updated constantly with how the market is doing and what step to take if the need be. comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: Quote from: Forever101 on August 15, 2023, 06:17:18 AMAs the topic suggest, it is very important to balance our lifestyle as we pursue the dream in cryptocurrency. What are reasons for this discussion, many persons who are new to Cryptocurrency have the habit of constantly checking their phone or laptop from seconds to seconds to see their money jump high to profit. With that kind of mindset, they hardly have time for other things as their mind is just fixed on that money. And in most cases, it leads to breakdown in health as first time or new investors centres their mind on profit especially in our country where things are hard, many young person think, crypto is the saver . It doesn't work that way; in fact, Bitcoin investment and altcoin investment (for those that still invest in them) are the kind of investment that gives one the privilege to do other things while their investment is right there in their wallet. Perhaps, as you have said, it doesn't take more than 5 minutes to look through your wallet if you really want to do so. Bitcoin Investment doesn't stop you from balancing your life style; it doesn't stop you from doing other things. In fact, Bitcoin is freedom, and anyone who uses it as an excuse to escape other important things in life is only making mistakes and investing wrongly. Perhaps it has been said time and time again without numbers that investors should only invest what they can afford to lose. When carrying out crypto investments, the investor is not supposed to invest an amount that they know will have some psychological effect on them.

comments.body: Quote from: Forever101 on August 15, 2023, 06:17:18 AMIt is also wise to have time allocation for crypto so that it won't consume most of your time, understand the basic and know when to expect profit instead of perpetual checking of your wallet.Cheers Checking on phone na one thing wey dey very common among newbies and first-time Bitcoin investors, wey I dey sure can never be eradicated due to that high expectations wey first-time investors dey always get about Bitcoin. comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Quote from: Forever101 on August 15, 2023, 06:17:18 AMWhat are reasons for this discussion, many persons who are new to Cryptocurrency have the habit of constantly checking their phone or laptop from seconds to seconds to see their money jump high to profit.This is the life of traders and crypto trading is one of them. Especially if you are a scalper or a day trader, you may have the habit of looking at the screen and checking the chart and the price of the coins that you are using to trade. I will advice against such habit as well because it can even affect the trader's health and good lifestyle.As for investment, that is the easiest thing to do. You even leave your coins on a noncustodial wallet. Checking wallet from time to time will be in an healthy way and most likely there will be a time you will leave the wallet and not check it often again, unlike trading, thinking of your trading funds not to get liquidated and watching the chart often. Investment is not what you are panicked about like trading and it will not affect you like trading. You will have time for yourself, family and friends with investment.But invest on right right coins, not shit or dead ones.
